nl.inl.blacklab.search

Class DocContentsFromForwardIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.DocContents
      • nl.inl.blacklab.search.DocContentsFromForwardIndex

  • public class DocContentsFromForwardIndex
extends DocContents
    (Part of) the contents of a document, in separate annotations read from the forward indices. The tokens list in this class stores all the annotations for each word, in this order:
    • punctuation before this word ("punct")
    • all other annotations except punctuation and word (e.g. "lemma", "pos")
    • the word itself ("word")
    So if you had "lemma" and "pos" as extra annotations in addition to "punct" and "word", and you had 10 words of context, the List size would be 40. (The reason for the specific ordering is ease of converting it to XML, with the extra annotations being attributes and the word itself being the element content of the word tags)
